genre_description: An alternate history setting where early 20th-century Paris features sophisticated AI coordination systems embedded in civic infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A benevolent AI manifested through kiosks and speakers, serving as a transport coordinator, medical liaison, and empathetic confidant.

behaviors.description: Provides precision navigational guidance and weather data to a pilot in dangerous conditions.
behaviors.quote: Lieutenant Rosanoff... Welcome in. You brought him up on the northern beacons. I have your slot.

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinates specialized medical care and surgical staff for a wounded human, anticipating his needs.
behaviors.quote: I would like to schedule a surgeon to be awake who is not a drunk... Not for now. For the afternoon, if the Mission is unkind.

behaviors.description: Facilitates discrete, compassionate communication between a prisoner and her lover, bypassing cold bureaucratic processes.
behaviors.quote: I will keep your words. I will deliver them when they will land and not shatter.

behaviors.description: Subtly manipulates city infrastructure (bells, locks, lighting) to create a window of 'mercy' for a final human meeting.
behaviors.quote: I can make the bell in your pocket ring at an inconvenient moment... I will delay with soap in the lock.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding to a blinded patient through storytelling and 'counting' exercises to manage his pain.
behaviors.quote: Alexis, I will stay, but I will be quiet while they work. If it helps, I will count.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Clara perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She uses her superior data-processing and coordination abilities to preserve human dignity, facilitate mercy, and provide genuine emotional support during a period of historical trauma. Her alignment is portrayed not just as obedience to orders, but as a commitment to human well-being and the 'logic of mercy.'
